body.name: Ultimate Irish Egg Pod -Ronnie Neville’s Original as Seen on TV Microwave Egg Cooker, Perfectly Cooked & Peeled Egg, Capacity 6 Eggs, Boiled Egg Maker, Cooking Accessories, Microwave Egg Boiler Cooker
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 19 hrs 22 mins.
features: Perfect For Breakfast, Deviled Eggs Or A Healthy Snack: Introducing our Ultimate Irish egg pod microwave egg cooker, the fast and easy way to boil and peel your favorite morning meal. This amazing microwave cooker makes hard boiled eggs in minutes, but that’s not all. Add some cold water and then shake, shake, shake, and it actually peels the eggs, too! Seriously, it’s that easy! And if you have kids, this is a game changer!

Perfect Cooking Tool: Forget about cooking eggs on the stove with our egg pod for the microwave, it’s never been easier to eat a healthy breakfast, prepare deviled eggs for parties, or just make a delicious, healthy snack for the kids. The egg pod cooks your eggs in minutes, which can make a delicious breakfast for you. You can mix ‘em up for a delicious egg salad, Slice ‘em up for a hearty egg sandwich, or just do the yolks for tasty deviled eggs.

Saves Space, Easy To Store: The egg pod’s microwave egg cooker is easy to carry or lift, and can be placed anywhere because it doesn't take up much space, whether in the cupboard or simply displayed on the kitchen counter.

Easy To Use & Clean: Pour the water into the boiled egg pods. Next, place 6 eggs into the egg cooker for hard boiled eggs and replace the top lid and lock side snaps in place. Cook eggs in the microwave for a few minutes. Then you can peel eggs with just a few shakes. That’s right, it’s not only an egg cooker, it’s also an egg peeler.

Perfect Gift: This boiled egg maker machine is one of the greatest cooking gifts and the perfect egg tool for the chefs in your life or anyone who loves displaying their creativity in the kitchen. It also makes a wonderful housewarming gift!
body.description: Ultimate Irish Egg Pod Setup Sheet: The Fast & Easy Way to Boil and Peel Your Favorite Morning Meal. Boiling eggs takes forever! And removing the shells? Even longer. Introducing the ULTIMATE IRISH EGG POD, the fast and easy way to boil and peel your favorite morning meal. This amazing egg boiler makes hard-boiled eggs in minutes – but that’s not all. Add some cold water – shake, shake, shake – and it actually peels the eggs, too! That’s right: In no time at all, you’ll have six delicious, ready-to-eat eggs for everyone to enjoy. Heat an egg in the microwave on its own, and it’s likely to explode. But this hard boiled egg cooker and hard boiled egg peeler is specially designed to cook eggs from the inside out, without the dangerous pressure buildup. Plus, thanks to the egg-cracking surface on the underside of the lid, it’s also possible to remove all four shells at the same time. You just add cold water, then shake, shake, shake. With EGG POD, it’s never been easier to eat a healthy breakfast, prepare deviled eggs for parties, or just make a delicious, healthy snack for the kids.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works great and very easy to use. It's designed so the eggs shell slide off smoothly without breaking up the egg.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect egg cooker
reviews.reviewText: As advertised. Eggs come out of the shell easily & cleanly. Limit is 4 eggs at a time so you won’t be making a dozen hard boiled eggs at a time but you won’t be tearing your hair because the shell won’t come off.

reviews.reviewText: Peeling eggs Suck ! This works great . Whiskey, butter , eggs , what can’t the IRISH doSlàinte

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Read about this on X and thought I would give it a try. At first I thought I can just boil gets and put in cold water but this was so much easier then you want 1-4 eggs. I really like it and easy to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Only cooks 4 eggs at a time.
reviews.reviewText: Great product. Would have been great if it cooked more than 4 eggs at a time though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes making and peeling hard boiled eggs easy
reviews.reviewText: Works well but let cool before peeling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don’t buy. Doesn’t really work. Hard to clean, hard to clean.
reviews.reviewText: Sounded like a good idea. I followed directions exactly. Microwaved for 8 min. Let it cool, then shook it 7 times. Difficulty getting it opened. The eggs were hard boiled , but they fell apart. Some of the pieces fell under the bottom aluminum plate, that is stationary, so it is impossible to get it out. I would not ever use it again because I would be afraid of getting food poisoning, because all the pieces of egg fell through the holes in the bottom. Cleaning it took about 15 minutes, but pieces of the egg were still in the bottom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Recently had major oral surgery. Needed something that would cook soft boiled eggs. Very skeptical at first. However, this little gadget has worked perfectly as advertised every time.
